Concept.displayName: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis
pN1: Metastasis with a lymph node mass 2 cm or less in greatest dimension, or 5 or fewer positive nodes, none more than 2 cm in greatest dimension

pN2: Metastasis with a lymph node mass greater than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm in greatest dimension; or more than 5 nodes positive, none greater than 5 cm; or evidence of extranodal extension of tumor
pN3: Metastasis with a lymph node mass greater than 5 cm in greatest dimension
